definitions.text: an inclined surface connecting two levels
North American perennial having a slender bulb and whitish flowers
a movable staircase that passengers use to board or leave an aircraft
behave violently, as if in state of a great anger

examples: the lion is rampant in this heraldic depiction

definitions.text: creep up -- used especially of plants
examples: The roses ramped over the wall

definitions.text: stand with arms or forelegs raised, as if menacing
